nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_success: The snapshot will be created shortly.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_fail: An error has occurred updating the snapshot intervals.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_informations: A snapshot is an instantaneous shot. It saves the status of your HA-NAS, at the precise moment that the snapshot is taken.
Snapshots take up space on your partition to work properly.
nasha_custom_snapshot_modal_fail_snapsho: The snapshot label cannot be longer than {{maxlength}} characters.
